properties.Name: JournalTransactionType
properties.Description:
A classification of journal transaction based on common function.

Ex:
- Bill From Vendor
- Credit From Vendor
- Payment To Vendor
- Credit Memo To Customer
- Credit Card Charge
- Check
- Bank Deposit
- Discount
- General Journal Entry
- Invoice
- Item Receipt
- Paycheck
- Statement Charge To Customer
- Cash Sales Receipt
- Sales Tax Payment
- Transferred Funds

Columns.Name: JournalTransactionTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Journal Transaction Type.

Columns.Name: JournalTransactionTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Journal Transaction Type.

Columns.Name: JournalTransactionTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Journal Transaction Type.
